client.map.model.handlers

Class EdgeHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.map.model.handlers.EdgeHandler

  • public class EdgeHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores and manages the edges contained in a map.
    Author:
    Jonathan Sadler

    • Method Detail

      • ContainsEdge

        public java.lang.Boolean ContainsEdge(int x1,
                                      int y1,
                                      int x2,
                                      int y2)
        Determines if an edge exists. Point order doesn't matter.
        Parameters:
        x1 - First x coordinate.
        y1 - First y coordinate.
        x2 - Second x coordinate.
        y2 - Second y coordinate.
        Returns:
        True if the edge exists, else false.

      • GetEdge

        public Edge GetEdge(int x1,
                    int y1,
                    int x2,
                    int y2)
        Returns the edge between the provided end points. Point order doesn't matter.
        Parameters:
        x1 - First x coordinate.
        y1 - First y coordinate.
        x2 - Second x coordinate.
        y2 - Second y coordinate.
        Returns:
        The associated edge.
